abstract: It’s the big guessing game on Wall Street and in Washington these days: How much equity will the government need to supply this time to pump up confidence in Citigroup and Bank of America — and will it lead to government control of America’s banking giants?
lead_paragraph: It’s the big guessing game on Wall Street and in Washington these days: How much equity will the government need to supply this time to pump up confidence in Citigroup and Bank of America — and will it lead to government control of America’s banking giants?
